title: Maharani Ruby Polki Haaram - A Regal Heirloom
materials: Hyderabadi Polish. Accents feature zircon stones.
features: A stunning multi-strand Haaram featuring strings of lustrous freshwater pearls and vibrant ruby beads. The centerpiece is an elaborate polki pendant showcasing a central oval-cut ruby surrounded by rose-cut polki diamonds. The pendant design incorporates a pair of peacocks (Mayura) at the top, symbolizing grace and royalty. Delicate pearl drops enhance the pendant's elegance. The metalwork showcases intricate filigree and Nakshi-inspired detailing, providing an antique finish.
colors: Predominantly gold with the deep red of the ruby
contrasted by the brilliance of the polki diamonds and the soft white of the pearls. The pink rubies add a touch of modern elegance.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. This piece adds a touch of regal splendor to any outfit.
description: This Maharani Haaram is a testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage. The use of high-quality polki diamonds and natural rubies ensures a lasting value. The intricate craftsmanship and traditional design make it a unique heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lasting shine. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty, royalty and is considered highly auspicious.
